|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);i.MX6UL;MCIMX6G, 2DVM05AA, CTAR1641, 1N52P, CHINA FOARCTA; |cpu1_cores = 1<!-- 1 --> |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- 900 / 696 MHz --> |cpu2chip1 = STMicro;STM32L431;STM32L, 431VCI6, 7BA2X 9R, PHL 647; |cpu2_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu2_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,X86, --> |cpu2_type_rev = <!-- CPU2 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu2spd = 80 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->

|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT6TL64M16BI-G0; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Cypress;CYW43340;CYW43340XKUBG; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 150/150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{FCC ST|02/26/2018|indexme.}}
"© 2017 NEST LABS 001-00188-01 REV 02" is silkscreened :on the board in the FCC photos.
==Links of Interest== *[http://electronics360.globalspec.com/article/9493/teardown-nest-learning-thermostat ''Teardown'' on '''Electronics360'''] <!-- "© 2016 NEST LABS 001-00073-02 REV 02" Major Components: Outer Ring, Machined Stainless Steel *2.08" Diagonal, TFT LCD, a-Si, TN, 480x480, N/T, 17g - :MFR: TIANMA MICRO ELECTRONICS CO LTD - MPN: TM030XDHG30 *Application Processor, 32-Bit, ARM Cortex-A9 1GHz & ARM Cortex-M4 227MHz Core, :64KB / 32KB L1 Cache, 144KB RAM / 96KB ROM, 2x 8-Channel 12-Bit ADC, PCIe 2.0, 40nm - :MFR: NXP SEMICONDUCTORS - MPN: MCIMX6X3EVK10AB *WLAN Module, 802.11b/g/n, Dual-Band 2.4/5GHz, Contain Cypress Semiconductor :CYW43340XKUBG - MFR: MURATA MANUFACTURING CO LTD *SDRAM, Mobile DDR2, 512MB, 533MHz - MFR: MICRON TECHNOLOGY INC - :MPN: EDB4432BAPA-1D-F *Flash, NAND, 512MB, SLC - MFR: CYPRESS SEMICONDUCTOR CORP - :MPN: S34MS04G200BHI000
*Cover Glass, Tempered Glass, Black Color Painted, Convex Glass, w/ Double Adhesive Tape :Analog ICs, 8-Layer, FR4, Lead-Free - MFR: NAN YA PCB CORP, Humidity Sensor -->
